जव(2)
East Godavari District, Rajamahendravaram Rural Mandal, Rajavolu Village, Door No. 3-124/Eru Villagers Vemagiri (Late) Ramulu Garu, Married Daughters of Mittapalli Prasad Garu, Wife 1) Mittapalli Venkatalakshmi (39 years) (Aadhar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX), Ditto Village Door No. 3-67 Villagers Kothapalli Chinaraju Garu, Wife 2) Kothapalli Rani (31 years) (Aadhar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX)
A joint deed of marriage signed by both of them.
This
is a Hindu undivided family. We are identical twins. The property as per the schedule below is the ancestral property of our father Vemagiri Ramulu, who enjoyed it with full rights till his lifetime and became intestate without writing any written documents. After his life, his wife Vemagiri Subbayamma, our mother, became intestate on 04-10-2018. Since the Varlas did not have any male child after the life of both of them, we, the female child of Varlas, inherited the property and have been enjoying it jointly with our full rights and possessions since that time till today. Since our family has grown, we are unable to enjoy the said property jointly, and with the opinion that for the betterment of each, they should enjoy it separately, according to this schedule, our joint family property, which we have been enjoying jointly till now, should be divided into two shares according to the elders for the well-being of our family. In the said shares, the property marked 'A' should be taken by the 1st of us, Mittapalli Venkatalakshmi, and the property marked 'B' should be taken by the 2nd of us, Kothtapalli Rani, and they should take possession of the property that has come to their respective shares. From this, they should enjoy the property that has come to their share with special rights, and they should pay all the taxes to be paid to the government separately, and they should enjoy it comfortably and freely with all the full rights of their sons and grandsons, by donating and selling it.
From this, we will not be able to quarrel in the future with any kind of shares, whether there are ups and downs, or if there are any harms. Even if we do so, it will not be valid. We have no debts that have come from the world, nor any debts that we have to give to the world.
From this, there is no relationship between one person's wealth and debts and the other's. 
A. Kada Akshmi

There is no other co-owner, co-parcener or other rightful owner or heir of the property except us. We have no other property to share except these properties.
The property has not been assigned by the Government as per the schedule. A.P. Stamp Act No. 9/77 does not apply to this property. The Scheduled Property has not been given any guarantee by the Government or any Government or Non-Government Institutions. The Scheduled Property is not Government Property. The sureties for this property, other than this section document, are mortgages, deeds, deeds agreements, tax-free, undisputed property, and the numbers, permits, boundaries and rights are correct and this deed has been written by us. For the purpose of registering the property in the accounts of the Government in whose name the property has come to be, the notices and agreements are filed. This deed We hereby declare that there are no mango, coconut, betel, sweet potato, trees, gardens or ponds in the land transferred by us and that if such details are found to have been concealed in the document, we agree to be prosecuted according to law and we will be liable for the payment of depreciation tax.

sections.content: The property acquired by Mittapalli Venkatalakshmi, by virtue of Partition Deed No. 1006 of 2023, dated 15/Feb/2023, being Schedule- A measuring an extent of 131 Sq.Yds., out of 199.5 Sq. Yds, bearing Door number 103-3-220, Assessment no. 721, Block no. 3, comprised in survey number 225/4, situated in Rajavolu Village, Rajamahendravaram Rural Mandal, within the District of East Godavari registered at sub-registrar office Kadiyam(420) is bounded as follows: North by: 43.6 Ft ‘B’ Schedule Kothapalli Rani Site South by: 42.6 Ft Anantharapu Vissak Site East by: 27.5FT Panchayathi Road West by: 27-5 Ft., House of Mortha Veerraju Note: It is to be noted that our legal verification is limited towards the property offered as security for the purpose of loan, i.e., Schedule-A property of the Partition Deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
